item.title: German video editor for social media - Upwork
item.description:
Hallo und danke für dein Interesse an diesem Job.

Ich suche einen erfahrenen Video Editor, der ein 45 Sekunden Reel schneidet. Klingt simpel, aber in 45 Sekunden kann viel passieren. :) Ziel ist ein Video nach Social Media Best Practice zu schneiden, das den Zuschauer ab dem ersten Cut fesselt.
Soundeffekte, Cuts & Zooms, you name it.

Aufbau des Reels:
Start mit einer kurzen Hook, Cut zum Mini Intro. Dann wird ein Spruch von einer Karte aus einem spirituellen Kartenset vorgelesen. Danach wird der Sprecher gezeigt, wie er einige inspirierende Sätze sagt, eine Frage ans Publikum und CTA stellt. Fertig.
Du erhältst das Video Material von 1-2 Lumix GH5 (Raw oder Natural), voraussichtlich in 4K.

Inhalt des Jobs:
- Schnitt des Videos in 9:16, Einsatz von Soundeffekten und Cuts für eine moderne, virale Optik ohne hektisch zu sein.
- Erstellung eines kurzen Intros (2-4 Sek.).  Für das Intro wird eine Animation geliefert (Logo Reveal), die noch mit Videomaterial/Hintergrund zusammengefügt werden muss.
- Schnitt in Premiere Pro CC. Du stellst mir nach dem Job die offene Premiere Datei und alle verwendeten Soundeffekte, Essential Graphics u.a. zur Verfügung für einen unterbrechungsfreien Workflow.

Wir haben immer wieder Reels und Videos zu schneiden. Wenn du einer langfristigen Zusammenarbeit interessiert bist, dann melde dich gerne.

Wenn dich der Job interessiert und du nächste Woche Zeit für den Schnitt hast (ab 23.6.), dann freue ich mich auf deine Nachricht. Bitte sende deine Preisvorstellung und einige vergleichbare Beispiele deiner Arbeit mit.

Viele Grüße
Philipp


Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Social Media Video, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Video Visuals for DJ party - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented visual designer to create 5 visuals for a DJ party. The visuals should be aligned with the brand's image and style (Mostly some CRT style footage) We will provide the background assets to incorporate into the visuals, you just need to add the brand logo and assets to the video in CRT style. The deadline for this project is today, so we need someone who can work efficiently and deliver high-quality designs within a short timeframe. We need the videos to be around 15 seconds that loops.

Skills needed:
- Graphic design
- Adobe Creative Suite
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

This is a small-sized project that can be completed within a day. We are seeking an expert visual designer who has experience working on similar projects and can produce visually stunning designs that capture the essence of the brand and the party atmosphere.

I will send everything (assets and details) one you apply for the job

Here are the example assets that you will be provided, you would just need to incorporate the brands logo into them:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1eUE566kjAHoOXugkLy7s3JUZ4uSxVZPQ

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 19, 2024 19:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: Panama
click to apply

item.title: Marketing Pitch Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video creator to produce a captivating marketing pitch video for our company. The video will be used to attract potential investors and showcase the unique value proposition of our business. The ideal candidate should possess a strong understanding of marketing principles and have experience in creating engaging video content. Responsibilities include scriptwriting, storyboarding, video production, and post-production editing. The video should effectively communicate our brand message, highlight our key offerings, and compel viewers to take action.

Skills required:
- Video production
- Scriptwriting
- Storyboarding
- Video editing
- Graphic design
- Animation

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Marketing Strategy, Video Commercial
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Marketing Strategy, Video Commercial
Country: United States

item.title: Copywriting videographer for business course - Upwork
item.description:
SL: Talented Video Editor Needed for Online Course From the Desk of Jesse Moskel:
I am looking for a skilled video editor who can cleanly and craftily edit videos for my upcoming high-ticket copywriting course.
The scope of the work will include trimming down footage and breaking it up into bite sized chunks - there is no need for any fancy effects or anything like that.
The editor needs to be experienced, preferably with previous experience in other online courses. If you’re a newer account on Upwork, your proposal will still be considered - you just need to show that you’re good at what you do.
Expertise in any editing software will do, the final product just needs to look sharp. You must provide samples of your work to be considered.
You will receive a percentage of the revenue from the course for your payment. Details will be discussed further in the interview process

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:48 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Copywriting
Skills: Business, Copywriting
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: TikTok / YouTube Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Shortify Media is an agency specialising in making short TikTok / YouTube Shorts videos for clients.

We are looking for a person who can use capcut or an editing software, who knows how to use tiktok and what is trendy right now.

We need 30 videos per month. You will get a long video from YouTube and you will have to cut it down into shorts. You will need to make the captions and make if fun and entertaining. Adding sound effects, emojis, coloring the captions, overlays and so on.

To be sure that you have read the description please include the word "sticks" in your reply.

If we like you we will hire you for long term and pay bonuses. Also it's a bonus if you have already done this and have some examples.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, TikTok, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, TikTok, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Bulgaria

item.title: Video Editor for Fast Paced 30 Seconder Agency Reel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create a captivating 30-second reel that showcases the essence of our agency. The reel should be fast-paced and dynamic, grabbing the viewer's attention from the first frame. You will be provided with access to our visual content, music ideas, and a general direction of what we want to convey. Your role will be to bring it all together into a visually stunning and engaging final product.

   Skills required:
   - Proficiency in video editing software e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro + After Effects (huge plus)
   - Strong understanding of storytelling and visual composition
   - Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work
   - Attention to detail and exceptional organizational skills
   - Creative thinking and ability to bring innovative ideas to the table

This is a medium-sized project that can be completed within 1 - 2 weeks. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who has prior experience in creating captivating reels. If you have the expertise to create impactful visuals that leave a lasting impression, we want to hear from you!

(possibility of getting recurring projects from our agency)

**About us**
Welcome to 90U, where counter-culture meets creativity. We’re not your average branding and marketing agency—we specialize in crafting unique identities for cannabis brands that dare to be different. At 90U, we blend bold ideas with a fresh perspective to help your brand stand out in a crowded market. We’re all about pushing boundaries and creating campaigns that resonate with your audience. Let’s team up and elevate your brand to new heights, all while keeping it real and impactful.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Need Demonstration Videos that demonstrate our Web App - Upwork
item.description:
For this project, you'll be taking videos similar to this

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7Qdxlrr0KM

You would create new versions of this type of video using our new release and create a professional version, not the amateur one you see in the video.  I need professional-looking, fast-paced videos that get to the point quick and address each one of the App's core features.

1.  Onboarding Collections
2.  Onboarding Products
3.  Onboarding Custom Automations
4.  Import/Export
5.  Reporting


You will be re-doing similar  amateur videos like this

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tklhz4w3jyc


I am looking for FAST-PACED, to-the-point, screencast featurette training videos for this App.  You'll become an expert on the App, create training for it, and get steady work as I have other Apps you will do this for as well if you work out okay.

Here are your challenges as an overseas applicant (non-USA).

1.  Time Zone.  I will not be "signing on in your time zone", you will need to be available for -7 GMT chat's if you need to chat real-time.  Otherwise, it's email and that takes forever.  Be available for Chats.

2.  Language barriers:  You're going to need to leverage your GPT and ELEVENLABS resources to get this done.  I will not be able to help you with Messaging or grammar fixes.  English needs to be PERFECT without exception.  

Other than that,  the right candidate will see months of work with bonuses and steady pay increases as you become more valuable and more reliable.



Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

Budget: $30

item.title: Professional Video Editors 2 Hour Zoom Interview (experience with long-form video to short-form) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for professional video editors who are familiar with the process of converting a long-form video (like a YouTube video) to a short-form video (a TikTok, Instagram Reel, etc.).

The interview (on Zoom) will be 2 hours long. You will be asked questions about your video editing experiences and then we will observe you edit a YouTube video into a short-form video using your own video editing tools. We will record the interview. Please be prepared to share your screen during the part where we observe you edit.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00

item.title: Create Short Form Content for Tiktok and Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I am looking for someone with amazing video editing skills to create short form clips out of my podcast episode.

Each clip will be ~30 seconds long and will need to have subtitles and relevant graphics to the content being discussed.

Please send over any relevant work you have done as well as pricing on a per clip basis.

Here is a link to the long form content: https://youtu.be/zG06_RjteyI?si=lWmVy7eHJ-1R4Drn

We intend to release 2-3 episodes per month each with 5-7 clips so a total of ~20 clips per month.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Digital Video, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Video Commercial, Video Editing
